item.title: EP 106 - Balls Of Steel: The Cult Of Giant Testicles
item.itunes:title: Balls Of Steel: The Cult Of Giant Testicles
item.description:
Today we reluctantly taste our mucous, visit the temporary town of Crush, Texas and then we travel to Seattle to see who has the biggest balls.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

First off, the next time you have a runny nose don’t wipe it away so quickly! You have to taste it first because it might be more than just allergies . . .

Then we go back in time to the temporary city of Crush, Texas. One man has a dream: to crash two trains into each other as a promotional stunt. But when things don’t go as expected, the towns people pay with their lives!

And finally, we visit Seattle to expose a cult of body-builders who inflate their balls with saline. But when a few members decide to make the change permanent by injecting silicone into their testicles, the bodies start piling up.

Links:

Johnston County man's runny nose turns out to be leaking brain fluid

https://abc11.com/health/johnston-county-mans-runny-nose-turns-out-to-be-leaking-brain-fluid/4697753/

Crush, Texas

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crush%2C_Texas

A Train Company Crashed Two Trains. You Will Believe What Happened Next

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/train-company-crashed-two-trains-you-will-believe-what-happened-next-180964237/

The Great Texas Train Crash at Crush

http://www.unmuseum.org/crash.htm

Crush’s Locomotive Crash Was a Monster Smash

http://www.historynet.com/crushs-locomotive-crash-was-a-monster-smash.htm

Great Crush Collision March (SCOTT JOPLIN, 1896) Ragtime Piano Roll Legend

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tp_k5Li3C-Y

Justice for Jack - The Project

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8-_o2HTjt8

Mother of Australian man who died after injecting his scrotum with silicone to appease his master's 'inflation fetish' confronts his bondage partner

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-6357387/Mother-Australian-man-died-injecting-scrotum-silicone-faces-bondage-master.html

"Thank you for allowing me to serve you."

https://kiwifarms.net/threads/dylan-hafertepen-noodlesandbeef-ekigyuu-beefdumplings-california-cow.49057/

Man dies after injecting silicone in genitals, mom blames sex ‘cult’ master

https://nypost.com/2018/11/07/man-dies-after-injecting-silicone-in-genitals-mom-blames-sex-cult-master/

Friends Say Dylan Hafertepen Killed Jack Chapman and 2 Other Gay Men With His "Ball Inflation Fetish"

http://www.aazios.com/articles/friends-say-dylan-hafertepen-killed-jack-chapman-and-2-other-gay-men-his-ball-inflation

Rules and Responsibilities:

https://web.archive.org/web/20160408033506/http://brandedbulltank.tumblr.com/post/38438967258/rules-and-responsibilities

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
